h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: He's much stronger than any plant Guai you've encountered, and summons poison pools all around him. He can also shoot out several poison projectiles at you from all sides, and stab the ground repeatedly to cause poison explosions.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
He's much stronger than any plant Guai you've encountered, and summons poison pools all around him. He can also shoot out several poison projectiles at you from all sides, and stab the ground repeatedly to cause poison explosions.
